summary: Custom configs for better visuals and a graphic improvement.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.abload.de/image.php?img=banner1jlj0.png][img]http://www.abload.de/img/banner1jlj0.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.abload.de/image.php?img=videos3p35.jpg][img]http://www.abload.de/img/videos3p35.jpg[/img][/url]
[youtube]IExwSZEi_04?hd=1[/youtube]
[url=http://www.abload.de/image.php?img=instructions2tkm3.jpg][img]http://www.abload.de/img/instructions2tkm3.jpg[/img][/url]

  - Place the files from \'main directory\' in :
  \'c:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\'

  - Copy the \'SkyrimPrefs.ini\' out of the \'SkyrimPrefs\' folder in 
  \'X:\\Users\\YOURNAME\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\'
  and replace the old one. If you haven\'t 1920 x 1080 Pixels as 
  resolution you have to open the file with Notepad and find the 
  lines \'iSize W=1920\' and \'iSize H=1080\'and change the numbers 
  to your width and hight. 

 - Start Skyrim and have fun :)

  * NOTE you can enable/disable the ENB by pressing SHIFT + F12
 
  [url=http://www.abload.de/image.php?img=reccomendedfora6.jpg][img]http://www.abload.de/img/reccomendedfora6.jpg[/img][/url]

  TESV Acceleration Layer		  - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4387]link[/url]
  Skyrim HD - 2K Textures  	          - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=607]link[/url]
  RWT Realistic Water Textures	  - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=711]link[/url]
  Skyrim Flora Overhaul 		  - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]link[/url]
  HD Furniture and barrels final	  - [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.phpid=238]link[/url]

[url=http://www.abload.de/image.php?img=changeloguqkqe.jpg][img]http://www.abload.de/img/changeloguqkqe.jpg[/img][/url]

  - v.1.1 better lightning , a little bit lesser saturation   

  - v.1.0 darker nights dungeons etc. , the Enbseries 1.02 as base and a lot of little improvements

  - Beta


  [color=green][size=+1][b]>>>>>>Big thanks to \'Boris Vorisontov\'<<<<<<[/b][/size][/color]
author: GenyX

files.name: NEW Custom ENBseries and FXAA Settings - GenyX
